title: (x) "...von Konditor" italic serif - Favrille {Nick Cooke}
content:
Please, if anybody can identify this font, or knows a similar one - HELP!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Dsc00200-2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100510081613/http:/typophile.com/files/Dsc00200-2.jpg) | 6.9 KB |
author: mirmur

comments.content:
That's Favrile Bold italic, (ID'd from an old Linotype book, so I don't know if there's a digital version).

Nick Cooke

There are at least two digital versions: 'Fascinate' from NovelFonts, and 'Francois' from SERIALS.

- Mike Yanega
